Key Match Events: During Monday's contest, the Golden State Warriors lead the Washington Wizards 54-45 after the first two quarters.
Trayce Jackson-Davis led the Warriors with 10 points against his former team.
Stephen Curry returned to action after missing the last three games with a peroneal strain and scored eight points, including a buzzer-three-pointer to end the second quarter.
Buddy Hield led the newfound 3-point duo with 10 points on 2-4 shooting from such a range.
Ex-Warriors guard Jordan Poole finished the first half leading the Wizards with 14 points, two steals, and two blocks.
